name: PIU!
description:
Help Piu, the little adventurous penguin, to slide down the mountain with his ice cube! Watch out the trees and rocks or it's fall over!

Control Piu left and right with arrows keys or A/D keys.

I'm really proud of this game. It's my first game with handmade art all by myself! If you like it, rate the game and write a review. All feedback is awesome! =D

|CREDITS|

- You can follow all my projects following me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/keizerzilla

- The great music was composed by Rezornerd (totally misspelled inside the game, sorry man ><). Give him some love: www.twitter.com/rezoner

I hope you enjoy PIU! Time to slide down!
